N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1551.1 - Authority and purpose

State Regulations

The State Environmental Quality Review (SEQR) act of 1975, as
amended, article 8 of the Environmental Conservation Law, provides that all
agencies of the State shall prepare, or cause to be prepared by contract or
otherwise, an environmental impact statement (EIS) on any action they propose
or approve which may have a significant effect on the environment. This Part is
adopted pursuant to subdivision (3) of section
8-0113
of the Environmental Conservation

Law, which requires agencies to adopt and publish such additional procedures as
may be necessary for the implementation by them of SEQR, consistent wtih the
statewide rules and regulations (6 NYCRR Part
617
) adopted by the Commissioner
of Environmental Conservation pursuant to subdivision (1) of section
8-0113
of the Environmental Conservation

Law. Notes
